query:
-- Criar registros de presença para agendamentos passados
INSERT INTO attendance (appointmentId, patientId, status, checkInTime, notes, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 
  a.id,
  a.patientId,
  CASE WHEN RAND() > 0.2 THEN 'present' ELSE 'absent' END,
  DATE_SUB(a.startTime, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE),
  CASE WHEN RAND() > 0.2 THEN 'Paciente chegou no horário' ELSE 'Falta justificada' END,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM appointments a
WHERE a.startTime < NOW()
LIMIT 5;

INSERT INTO attendance (appointmentId, patientId, status, checkInTime, notes, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 
  a.id,
  a.patientId,
  CASE WHEN RAND() > 0.2 THEN 'present' ELSE 'absent' END,
  DATE_SUB(a.startTime, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE),
  CASE WHEN RAND() > 0.2 THEN 'Paciente chegou no horário' ELSE 'Falta justificada' END,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM appointments a
WHERE a.startTime < NOW()
LIMIT 5;
